original_title: It's Dog to Make A Houseplant If You're Sandwich
overview: In an anonymous suburbia of the near future, middle-aged dad Graeme becomes increasingly perplexed after his neighbour's dog vanishes, his wife and child disappear and then his favourite gadget goes haywire – but surely things can’t get any worse?
title: It's Dog to Make A Houseplant If You're Sandwich
